#summary IPTWeather user preferences.

Settings are in the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/wiki/Configuration" target="_blank">weather.ini file</a>.<br />
They are commented, but if you have some questions, I will answer to them with pleasure.<br />
You can easily change your location thanks to the manageIPTWLocation.mscr script.<br />
You can switch between your favorite locations quickly using the quickIPTWFavoriteLocationChange.mscr and setIPTWFavoriteLocation.mscr scripts.<br />
